titleStmt.title: A declaration and instructions from the Committee of Estates, to the colonels and committees of warre, in the severall sheriffdoms of the Kingdom of Scotland concerning their generall rendezvous at Hairlaw within four miles of Berwick, upon the 29 of this present December, with a body of twenty five thousand horse and foot.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
